| description       = The Azure Circle started as little more than a band of street thugs. They used extortion and bribery to convince the authorities to turn a blind eye to their many disreputable deeds. In doing so, the rakes found they had free rein to do as they pleased. Their gang soon grew into a criminal empire the rival of any guild in Eora.

This empire was built on coin acquired through illicit trade, protection schemes, and - as it had been since their founding - out-and-out robbery. When clients, rivals, or associates refused to comply with the wishes of the Circle, they would quickly find themselves at the mercy of the organization's enforcers - remorseless killers clad in azure blue cloaks who would ambush their victim en mass and stab them to death.
